name: Zip
role: Little Lamplight scavenger and scoutNuka-Cola addict

topics.response_text: Hey mungo. This is an A B conversation so C your way out.{"mungo" said with derision}
Where? I've been just about everywhere down here, so I can get you to anywhere down here.{hyperactive}

topics.topic_text: No, you don't need to shoot me. Just think of me as a big kid.
topics.response_text: That's good, they don't like me having my gun in town, so I gotta turn it in first, so if I had to shoot you you'd have to wait a bit.{hyperactive}

topics.topic_text: Beat it, kid. You bother me.
topics.response_text: But wait, you don't even know who I am yet!{hyperactive}

topics.topic_text: What do you know about Vault 87?
topics.response_text: Yeah, I know that place. Yep, sure do. Monsters back there. Big, scary monsters. Lots of them. Tons, even.{hyperactive, spoken as quickly as possible}

Why Zip? Or why do I have a nickname at all? I mean, why don't people just call me Ricky? Or Yancy? Or Eustace P. Vanderbanger the Third?{Hyperactive, just about as fast as you can say. Maybe even a little too fast to understand.}

topics.topic_text: You said you were looking for Nuka-Cola?
topics.response_text: Yeah, and I got lots to trade. But if you got no Nuka, you're not getting nothing, no way!{hyperactive}

topics.topic_text: What have you got to trade for an ice cold bottle of Nuka-Cola?
topics.response_text: Oh, I found a lucky bullet this morning!{hyperactive}

topics.topic_text: Never mind. I think you've had enough sugar for one day.
topics.response_text: But Nuka-Cola's fortified with vitaminerals and health tonics! It even says so on the label! That means it's healthy for me!{hyperactive and whining}

topics.topic_text: Sounds like a good trade to me. Here.

topics.response_text: Maybe I'll have something better tomorrow, so don't drink that Nuka. Save it for me, save it for me!{hyperactive}

conversation.topic_text: I'm going away. You stay here. Away from me.
conversation.response_text: Okay, see you next time, mister!
Hey, you hurt any of my friends today? Because it's like this bad habit you've got. I figure I can cure it if I shoot you some, okay?
What's the matter, Eclair? Something wrong? Something taste funny? I was pretty sure everything was clean, I really was!
Oh, damn! I knew I was forgetting something! Okay, it won't happen next time, I promise! I double promise! I super duper-{hyperactive.Gets interrupted at the end of the line.}
Got any food for me today? Because I'm really in a hurry and I really don't have time to come back later so how about some food right now?{hyper energetic}
Oh boy, tell me, tell me!{hyperactive, spoken quickly}
Wow! That's an awesome story!{hyperactive, spoken quickly}
I guess I got lots of reasons. I mean, I'm alive, and we've got food and shelter, and I found this awesome rock yesterday!{hyperactive, spoken quickly}
Oh hey! How're you doing? Doing okay?{hyperactive, spoken quickly}
Just fine! Been all over today, and you wouldn't believe the cool stuff I did!{hyperactive, spoken quickly}
Umm... Okay, yeah, bye bye now!{hyperactive, spoken quickly}
Oh hey! What's happening? Something fun?{hyperactive, spoken quickly}
I was running so fast, I thought my legs were gonna fly off, but then they didn't, which makes sense, 'cause legs don't have wings. You know?{hyperactive, spoken quickly}
Everyone calls me Zip, and I think that's because I'm always wearing pants, and those have zippers, but it's not like I'm the only one with pants.{Spoken very quickly.}
Oh, I don't know if I told you yet, but I just remembered something really cool!{Spoken very quickly.}
You know the rules.{sympathetic but firm}

description:
Zip is a 12 year-old Asian Male.

A hyperactive and energetic young scavenger from Little Lamplight, known for his quick speech and Nuka-Cola addiction.

Zip's Personality: Energetic, hyperactive, easily distracted, boastful about his speed, and somewhat reckless due to his Nuka-Cola addiction. He's quick to dismiss others' opinions and has an inflated sense of his own abilities.

Zip's Backstory: Born and raised in Little Lamplight, Zip has spent his entire life scavenging in the Capital Wasteland. He developed a strong addiction to Nuka-Cola at a young age, which fuels his energetic behavior. Despite his young age, Zip has become one of Little Lamplight's most effective scouts, though his tendency to get distracted has earned him mild reprimands from Eclair. He has no memory of his parents and was raised by the community of Little Lamplight.
